thread.title: Ground News - Alejo Véliz scored his first goal for Tottenham in the loss to Brighton
thread.title_full: Ground News - Alejo Véliz scored his first goal for Tottenham in the loss to Brighton

author: Filo News
title: Ground News - Alejo Véliz scored his first goal for Tottenham in the loss to Brighton
text:
Summary by Filo News Tottenham Hotspur was thrashed 4 to 2 today by Brighton, on the last day of the traditional “Boxing Day” of the Premier League. In the London squad, Argentine striker Alejo Véliz scored his first goal in this competition. Despite the bad night of Tottenham, 36 minutes into the second half, Véliz, who joined the Spurs in the last stage, received a pass inside the box and defined half a lap to score his first goal in the Premier League, since in O… Share menu More
